com.greystripe.sdk
Class GSFullscreenAd

java.lang.Object
  com.greystripe.sdk.GSFullscreenAd
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeviceInfo.LocationListener, GSAd
public final class GSFullscreenAd
extends Object

Instantiate this class to create a fullscreen ad that you can fetch, display, etc.

Constructor Detail

GSFullscreenAd

public GSFullscreenAd(android.content.Context context)
Constructs a new FullscreenAd. Use this if you have specified your application identifier GUID in AndroidManifest.xml.

Must be called on the main UI Thread.

Parameters:
context - The Application Context.

GSFullscreenAd

public GSFullscreenAd(android.content.Context context,
                      String guid)
Constructs a new FullscreenAd. Use this if you have NOT specified your application identifier GUID in AndroidManifest.xml.

Must be called on the main UI Thread.

Parameters:
context - The Application Context.
guid - Your unique application identifier guid.
Method Detail

fetch

public void fetch()
Request a new ad. You cannot request a new ad if:
1. an ad is currently being fetched,
2. a successfully fetched (cached) ad has not been displayed, or
3. an ad is currently being displayed.

display

public void display()
If an ad is ready, display it fullscreen. If a fullscreen is currently being displayed on the screen, do nothing.

onLocationUpdated

public void onLocationUpdated(android.location.Location location)
Specified by:
onLocationUpdated in interface DeviceInfo.LocationListener

isAdReady

public boolean isAdReady()
Indicates that an ad is fetched and ready to display and there is nothing that would prevent the display from occurring (e.g. no network connectivity).

Specified by:
isAdReady in interface GSAd
Returns:
True if an ad is ready to display and a display is possible

getId

public int getId()
Description copied from interface: GSAd
Get the ad id if one is fetched and ready to display.

Specified by:
getId in interface GSAd
Returns:
The ad id of an ad that's ready to display. If no ad is ready to display or the ad is broken, this returns -1.

addListener

public void addListener(GSAdListener listener)
Description copied from interface: GSAd
Register an AdListener to be notified of ad receipt, dismissal, and click messages.

Specified by:
addListener in interface GSAd
Parameters:
listener - The AdListener to add.

removeListener

public void removeListener(GSAdListener listener)
